info.description: This is a simplified respresentation of Meetup's published API which you can find out more about https://www.meetup.com/meetup_api/. This Open API specificaton is not published or maintained by Meetup.
info.title: Meetup Public Read-only API

get.summary: Retrieve Meetup Group by URL name

parameters.name: meetup-group
parameters.description: URL name of Meetup Group. i.e. Azure-Sydney-User-Group

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of optional field names to append to the response

get.description: Retrieve Meetup Group by URL name

parameters.name: meetup-group
parameters.description: URL name of Meetup Group. i.e. Azure-Sydney-User-Group

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of optional field names to append to the response

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: When true, sorts results in descending order. Defaults to false

parameters.name: has_ended
parameters.description: Returns events which have ended when true. When false, returns events which are ongoing or upcoming.

parameters.name: no_earlier_than
parameters.description: An optional timestamp that represents a lower time bound (inclusive) for the start time of events in the local time of the group. If provided, it must be a string in ISO 8601 format without a time zone specified, i.e. 2018-06-01T00:00:00.000

parameters.name: no_later_than
parameters.description: An optional timestamp that represents an upper time bound (exclusive) for the start time of events in the local time of the group. If provided, it must be a string in ISO 8601 format without a time zone specified, i.e. 2018-06-01T00:00:00.000

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of results to return in a page. Must be an integer greater than or equal to 1. Defaults to 200

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of event statuses. Valid values are: 'cancelled', 'draft', 'past', 'proposed', 'suggested', or 'upcoming'

parameters.name: meetup-group
parameters.description: URL name of Meetup Group. i.e. Azure-Sydney-User-Group

parameters.name: eventid
parameters.description: Alphanumeric identifier for a single Meetup Group Event. i.e. '258375479'

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of optional field names to append to the response

403.description: Meetup Event not available via unauthorised call

get.summary: Retrieve the status of the Meetup API
get.description: Retrieve the status of the Meetup API

base_url.description: A base url that can be use to construct a photo url from its components
base_url.title: Photo Base URL

type.description: Type of photo. One of 'event' or 'member'
type.title: Photo Type

id.description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for event
id.title: Event ID

duration.description: Scheduled event duration in milliseconds, if an end time is specified by the organiser.
duration.title: Event Duration (ms)

description.description: Description of the event in HTML. Email addresses and phone numbers will be masked.
description.title: Event Description (HTML)

local_date.description: The local date of the Meetup in ISO 8601 format
local_date.title: Event Local Date (ISO8601)

local_time.description: The local time of the Meetup in ISO 8601 format
local_time.title: Event Local Time (ISO8601)

manual_attendance_count.description: Manually entered total attendee headcount, if any exists
manual_attendance_count.title: Manual Attendee Count

past_event_count_inclusive.description: Number of past events that happened before and including this event.
past_event_count_inclusive.title: Past Event Count

plain_text_description.description: Plain text version of the event description. Email addresses and photo numbers will be masked.
plain_text_description.title: Event Description (Plaintext)

plain_text_no_images_description.description: Plain text version of the event description without images. Email addresses and photo numbers will be masked.
plain_text_no_images_description.title: Event Description (Plaintext, No images)

short_link.description: A shortened link for the event on meetup.com
short_link.title: Event Shortlink

time.description: UTC start time of the event, in milliseconds since the epoch
time.title: Event Start Time (UTC, ms)

utc_offset.description: Local offset from UTC time, in milliseconds
utc_offset.title: Event Start Time UTC offset (ms)

waitlist_count.description: Number of members on the waitlist, if one exists
waitlist_count.title: Waitlist Count (if any)

yes_rsvp_count.description: Number of yes RSVPs including guests
yes_rsvp_count.title: RSVP Count

created.description: Time the group was created in milliseconds since the epoch
created.title: Group Create Date (ms)

is_simplehtml.description: 'true' when the group description has been saved in a simplified HTML format, 'false' otherwise.
is_simplehtml.title: Description is Simplified HTML

join_mode.description: Who can join this group and how. One of 'approval', 'closed', or 'open'
join_mode.title: Group Join Mode

localized_country_name.description: Name of country of the group
localized_country_name.title: Country Name (Localized)

localized_location.description: City/State or City/Country of the group
localized_location.title: State or Country (Localized)

members.description: Number of members of the Group
members.title: Group Member Count

name.description: Name of the Group (if it has one)
name.title: Group Name

plaintext_description.description: Description of the group, in plain text format.
plaintext_description.title: Group Description (Plaintext with Images)

plain_text_no_images_description.description: Description of the group, in plain text format with no images.
plain_text_no_images_description.title: Group Description (Plaintext, No Images)

short_link.description: A shorted URL for the group
short_link.title: Group Shortlink

url_Name.description: Used to identify the group on meetup.com
url_Name.title: Group URL Name

timezone.description: This represents the universal timezone identifier for the group
timezone.title: Group Timezone

externalDocs.description: Find out more about the Meetup API
